info.name: Star Trek Logo Home Button (Tumblr)
info.description: Just a little replacement for the 'home' button on Tumblr, Trek style. Looks best combined with a theme that hides the little arrow underneath, check screenshots for example.
info.additionalInfo: This is my first userscript, and I used the same code that's been rehashed for dozens of other home button replacements. Simpler version here.
